quoteText:
If you enable location services on your mobile device, Zillow collects the location of your device.&nbsp.
We use that information to provide you with location-based information and ads, like homes and real estate professionals in your area, and to offer location-based services, like allowing you to unlock and tour Zillow Offers homes on your own schedule and claiming your home on Zillow.
title: This service may collect, use, and share location data

tosdr.case: This service may collect, use, and share location data
